summary: Aliens from another world send a huge robotic accumulator to invade the Earth and absorb all energy it comes in contact with.
cast: Jeff Morrow|Barbara Lawrence|John Emery|George O'Hanlon|Morris Ankrum|Kenneth Alton|John Parrish|Jose Gonzales-Gonzales|Richard Harrison|Marjorie Stapp|Robert Shayne|Don Eitner|Gordon Mills|John Halloran|Robert Stevenson|Baxter Ward
title: Kronos
